website_summaries.verdict: Mazuri’s zoo-grade chinchilla pellets are hay-based, loaded with essential vitamins, and offer all the nutrition your pet needs. Well worth the investment.
pros: Alfalfa meal, soybean meal, wheat, timothy hay, and oats are the first five ingredients
cons: A top-tier chinchilla and degu food, but we wish it was available in larger bag sizes

customer_reviews.title: So far, the best. I have a very happy animal!
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla is an elitist. She snubbed her Oxbow pellets and just left them sitting there for long periods of time. She would eat half of one, or bite it off, then just spit it out and then throw it away, no bueno. Days of half-eaten pellets sitting in her bowl. I thought she wasn't hungry but it was the ingredients, she doesn't like soybean oil or other things inside the cheaper pellets, she has a very delicate digestive system. She gets sick from sugar or bad treats so I have to be careful. This is more expensive for sure, but she eats a whole bowl in one night!
customer_reviews.author: Ksusha

customer_reviews.title: Only food for my chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: This brand is the only food I feed to my chinchillas. My girls are healthy with good teeth and no digestive issues. Nothing broken so nothing to fix. Buying Mazuri on Amazon is my "in a pinch" solution because it tends to be a bit more expensive. Normally I buy 25 lbs bags for $19 at mazuri.com But like I said, in a pinch when I need it fast, Amazon is the best answer
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Way expensive
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla is 25+ years old. All she eats everyday is this brand diet, Timothy hay, and a few raisins. Can’t complain about her diet when she is having such a long, healthy life. I don’t want to change the old lady’s food at this point but the price is beyond ridiculous! I hate paying almost 18 bucks for 2.5 lbs. of stupid pellets!
customer_reviews.author: Smug

customer_reviews.title: Winnie's Mealtime Faves
customer_reviews.text: My Chinchilla seems to really enjoy this particular brand. The previous brand was ok, but was wasted. She actually finished her bowl in a couple days time. These pellets paired with Small Pet Select Timothy Hay is her favorite meal.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. B.

customer_reviews.title: One of the healthier chinchilla food choices
customer_reviews.text: My chinchillas love this food and I wouldn’t buy any other food. It doesn’t have the extras some chinchilla food has which is good since they don’t need a lot of extra sugars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla is a treat hog so I love that this food is not full of treats. I have fed him other foods with treats and he digs out all the pellets to only eat the treats. Little stinker! He’s still gets his share of treats but at least I can co trip the amount. Long live chinnies!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Springer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR MY CHINCHILLA
customer_reviews.text: I answered this for my chinchilla. He seems to really like the food. He was getting his food from a different supplier but they went out of business. I bought some Mazuri Chinchilla food and mixed it with some other food that was left from his old supply. Within a few weeks he was eating the Mazuri food. He seems healthy and happy as ever. Thank you. Don't really know about the flavor but Scout seems ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Cotriss

customer_reviews.title: Good Chin Food...Bad Price
customer_reviews.text: My son’s chin loves this food, but we aren’t happy about the high price.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Top foodie
customer_reviews.text: Great quality chinchilla food. Henry Loves it! Came highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ShanTzu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get soggy in milk like those other brands
customer_reviews.text: Nutritionally complete and doesn’t get soggy in milk like those other brands. What more can I say? Oh, the chinchilla likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great chinchilla food
customer_reviews.text: Great and nutritious chinchilla pellets. Vets, chin rescues, and breeders all recommend this chinchilla food.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Lewis

customer_reviews.title: my chinchilla loves this brand
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla loves this food. She won't eat other brands once her tried this Mazuri.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Z

customer_reviews.title: My chinchilla loves this
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing I feed my chinchilla. I put mine into an airtight container because otherwise my dogs can get into it. However it comes in a resealable bag so you could just keep it in that.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Mazuri Chinchilla Food...
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla would not eat it.. I had to get Oxbow brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Z

customer_reviews.title: cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: on time and well packed., as to flavor my cat did not tell me
customer_reviews.author: indexer

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price and my chinchilla really enjoys it. I will buy again once this bag is empty.
customer_reviews.author: WOLFSSLAYER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My chinchilla, Sebastian, has eaten this for years. I would never dream of changing him to anything else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for furry friends!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old pet chinchilla loved this food. After losing weight due to illness switching his diet slowly to Mazuri pellets has helped him regain strength and gain back weight. Highly recommend for your pets. Best nutritional value.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Our pet loves it.
customer_reviews.text: The product is very high quality and my pet loves it.
customer_reviews.author: lark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chinchilla food
customer_reviews.text: This product is sometimes hard to find in our rural area. It shipped quickly and arrived without issue. Great, quality food!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best food around
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY food my chinchillas will eat! I’m glad this ships right to your home in a matter of days and isn’t going to cost a lot! Mine came with a receipt with a little “Thank you! :)” written on it!
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer SUPER Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My hinchullas love this food!!! First time buy. Bought for great recommendations and personal research and review and no problems so far
customer_reviews.author: Figueroa R.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing it’s pet food
customer_reviews.text: I mean it’s pet food and he likes it 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Christian marquis

customer_reviews.title: This great product is finally available on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality chinchilla food. We started our chinchillas out on this and have kept them on it ever since. It's not good to switch food on them; their digestive systems don't handle it well. Mazuri used to be extremely hard to find: not online and not at a local pet stores. We had to special order it from a feed store in a 20lb bag. We ended up wasting most of it, because it should be used within 6 weeks of opening for maximum nutrition. However the 20lb bag did only cost $18, so this price is definitely more per lb, but much easier to get and currently available through Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: lani girl*

customer_reviews.title: Good diet for pet chinchillas
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent quality diet for pet chinchillas. I only gave it 3 stars because while being good for pet chinchillas, I would NOT recommend it if you ever plan to breed your chinchillas. It does not meet the nutritional needs of pregnant or nursing moms.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

product_meta.title: Mazuri | Nutritionally Complete Chinchilla Food | 2.5 Pound (2.5 lb)
product_meta.description: Mazuri Chinchilla Diet offers proper chinchilla nutrition in pellet form for all life stages. This highly palatable, sweet-smelling chinchilla food contains Timothy hay for fiber and flaxseed for Omega-3 fatty acids as well live probiotics to support gastrointestinal health in these night-feeding mammals.
feature_bullets: Nutritionally complete chinchilla food - No supplementation required
Contains multiple fiber sources, including Timothy hay
Contains flaxseed, live probiotics, natural Vitamin E and stabilized Vitamin C
